OpenNN::PerformanceFunctional::SecondOrderEvaluation

OpenNN::PerformanceFunctional::SecondOrderEvaluation Struct Reference

#include <performance_functional.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

double performance
Vector< double > gradient
Matrix< double > Hessian

Detailed Description

Set of evaluation value, gradient vector and Hessian matrix of the peformance function. A method returning this structure might be implemented more efficiently than the performance, gradient and Hessian methods separately.
